result.eng: I learned Esperanto as a hobby.
result.ga: D'fhoghlaim mé Esperanto mar chaitheamh aimsire
result.orig: D'fhoghlaim mé Esperanto mar chaitheamh aimsire

result.ponchtml: D'ḟoġlaim mé Esperanto mar ċaiṫeaṁ aimsireI learned Esperanto as a hobby.

result.eng: He is a thouroughly learned man.
